eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Emmet, IA; AT 01:44 PM ON SEP 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:53 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Wallingford Water shut off due to water main break. Unknown on time frame for repair. For updates seek Wallingford Fire Department Facebook page and KILR
